text: I see.. haha at 1st thought was a scam or something lol..

Why selling your car in Singapore is an annoying experienceHow difficult can selling your car in Singapore be? It's just a simple exchange of cash for car right? Let's find out just how frustrating it can be.➡️ Read itHERE!👉🏻 Find out why..
Hello  for used car  normally will the dealer ask u to put some deposit before agreeing to send the car for inspection? How is the procedure like? Thanks
If got the VR6 Lagi rare
Some yes some no. If yes  just put bare minimum will do and better state the conditions clearly.Some will say it’s just minor wear and tear  so you have to buy the car otherwise deposit forfeited.
If the results are acceptable  am I obliged to buy the car?
If you interested enough to send for an inspection  and there’s minimal issues
What’s stopping you from buying it?
Is inspection usually the last step? E.g. should we discuss the financial and stuff before or after the inspection?
if you want to nego price  of course you do it before sending for inspection
So once I am ok with the price  I send for inspection. If inspection results are not as expected  I can get back deposit (if any) or I can nego for even lower price  right?
Hello  just received LTA notification on OBU installation.Is it better to go vicom or back to car agent to do the replacement.
Deposit then can PPIConditions1) no major accident2) no engine or gb failure3) usually i will add if odo tamper deposit refund3rd condition see dealer okay to accept
If dealer dont let u PPI u can walk away
I'm going to Car Specialist and Platinum Motoring. Anyone has any comment on them? Thanks
Oh I dunno yet. Haven't ask
Isn't the ppi charge by the inspection companies like vicom and sta?
If me I just test drive n floor gas then check leaks
Hmm...why so specific on this? Cn7 is known to leak or?
Hmm I think u ppi better
Ppi how much u can accept?
100+ i think u can get a mechanic take mc n spend whole day check for u. they earn much less than 100+ a day
Oh it is evaluation  and not inspection?
Wow 226 can get 2 mechanics take mc check 8 hours for u lol
Haha..is it inspection or evaluation ah? Sta inspection is less than 100  Evaluation is 200 plus
Inspection is just for u to renew road tax
Evaluation / PPI just bring to your own trusted workshop
I don't have one..so probably gonna send to sta or vicom.
think better u ask around friends / family who drive for a trusted workshop
no need to be hyundai specialist or what  any bread n butter car workshop will do
Because it's cheaper and probably better than going to vicom or sta is it?
Heard some say vicom/sta nt so good. Own workshop more impartial. But alot of dealer don agree with personal ws. Only sta/vicom
Cos u go vicom / sta  if PPI no good  u will end up need go workshop to rectify issues anyway be it by dealer workshop or own
U add extra step that is not so efficient lol
Nt sure how true of the rumour i heard. Sta/vicom have good relationship with dealers so will tend to lean towards them?
Thanks all..managed to find a hood friend workshop
I PPI at my own workshops
Or go to a ws that specialise in the model or make of the cR
U looking at a CN7? PPI properly tiagong CN7 from prev models not as reliable but i would say its okay
Got it bro.. my friend intro me his trusted workshop 🙏
My friend mechanic also say cn7 should be ok
CN7 only got 1 model what no meh

as in i was talking about cn7 to a few frens awhile back
one of them said smth abt the model not as reliable as prev gen when i commented elantra AD no issue
Went to shell to pump fuel. The guy over pump till it leak out. I estimated about 3l of fuel over pump. Wana check what’s the impact on my car ah?
Nth. Just your wallet if you don't get compensated. 3L overflow is quite a feat. How does the attendant get it so wrong?
Sg need squeeze meh? I tot go msia then squeeze. Usually sg click i stop liao
Sg just tell them auto stop can liao
Over pump can spoil your fuel pump in the long run
